title: Dropbox releases official update for its macOS app with M1 support
content:
Earlier this year, Dropbox announced a new beta version of its macOS app with native support for the Apple Silicon platform. Now the long-awaited update with optimizations for the M1 chip is finally available for all Mac users.

moreâ€¦

The post Dropbox releases official update for its macOS app with M1 support appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The long-awaited Dropbox update with optimizations for the M1 chip family is finally available for all Mac users.
